message: Let's split a bit more than half-half to get started. It's best we settle quickly with the inflation.
Your turn Alice. I think we can do a little better than the last round - for me this time.  Let's try to settle this quickly.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I came down a bit, you come up a bit, and we can end this.  Each round is costing you money!
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but I'm also losing value.  This offer is a good compromise - let's close this out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm being extremely fair.  Take this deal, or you are going to really start hurting.
Okay Alice, you drive a hard bargain. This is it - my final offer. It's more than fair and we need to avoid this inflation any longer.
